text.0:
The 2020 statistics cited in the posts are not the final figures, and COVID-19 has killed more than 285,000 people in the country this year. #FakeNews #COVID19 #coronavirus #USA 

https://t.co/iIkxepHGyR
text.1:
A video viewed thousands of times in multiple posts on Facebook claims Pfizer-BioNTech's COVID-19 mRNA vaccine contains lipid nanoparticles that could be concealing "little computers". The claims are false. #FakeNews #COVID19 #coronavirus #CovidVaccine

https://t.co/16vTyN0pDh
text.2:
#WolfGupta is a 13-year old who 'learnt AI' to earn Rs. 20 crore salary at Google. He is also a 9-year old who 'learnt computers' to earn a Rs. 1.2 crore salary. Or, he's only 6-years old & already earning Rs. 150 crore/year by learning coding. #WhiteHatJr
https://t.co/5jLYABZulz
text.3:
A video has been viewed hundreds of thousands of times in multiple posts on Facebook which claim it shows that the AstraZeneca/Oxford #COVID19Vaccine contains MRC-5 cells originally taken from an aborted human foetus. The claim is misleading. #FakeNews

https://t.co/YUReeUmWIi
text.4:
Footage of a US law enforcement official speaking at a podium has been shared by social media users with a misleading claim that it shows her announcing details of an Indian call centre fraud scheme that was exposed in December 2020 #FakeNews #EUDisinfoLab
https://t.co/QrvPL58Ctv
text.5:
Dr Roberto Petrella makes several false claims about #COVID19 in a viral video that has been shared in multiple languages like #PCRtests are ineffective at detecting the virus, and vaccines can "weaken" someone's immune system. #FakeNews #coronavirus 

https://t.co/RMPUu60BWt
text.6:
Multiple Google services have gone down across the world in an unprecedented outage. Users are unable to access Google services like Gmail, YouTube and Drive although Google's search engine is still functioning. #GoogleDown #YouTubeDOWN #gmail

https://t.co/eLxrJdakx7
text.7:
A Facebook post shared thousands of times claims that taking a person's temperature with an infrared thermometer near their head risks damaging the pineal gland, which is located in the brain. This is false. #FakeNews #COVID19 #coronavirus 

https://t.co/IfdRxuqXaF
text.8:
Around 27 crore people have been prioritised through age-stratified lists. These include people over 50 years of age and those under 50 years of age living with associated comorbidities. #Vaccine #CoronaVaccine #coronavirus #COVID19 

https://t.co/gmfPM7Wyhm
text.9:
The top court's decision came on a plea filed by 94-year-old Veera Sarin who apart from seeking a declaration of the Emergency as unconstitutional, also sought compensation to the tune of Rs. 25 crores, which was denied by the court. #IndiraGandhi 

https://t.co/EJwpGG2qKL
text.10:
An old photo of a young boy in a Turkish family potrait has gone viral falsely claiming he is Dr Ugur Sahin, the CEO of Germany-based company, BioNTech SE, who developed the #COVID19 vaccine along with Pfizer. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #coronavirus

https://t.co/QZDQket2eP
text.11:
An image of actor Shah Rukh Khan made using Faceapp, a photo editing tool, is doing the rounds on social media with false claims that it is of a young Kashmiri lookalike of the actor. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #ShahRukhKhan @iamsrk 

https://t.co/rcbDilNUiB
text.12:
#burgerking debuted in the Indian stock markets nearly doubling its listed price on Monday, becoming the 4th IPO in 2020 to be subscribed more than 100 times. The stock was trading at Rs 138/ share at the time of writing this story. #burgerkingipo 

https://t.co/Q3WfHwuIdE
text.13:
A set of two images showing a team of Madame Tussauds museum taking dimensions of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's face for the latter's wax statue has resurfaced with misleading claims. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #NarendraModi 

https://t.co/cs0O8GWTy8
text.14:
An article shared thousands of times on Facebook claimed that Microsoft founder Bill Gates said there will be 700,000 "victims" of death or disability from a COVID-19 vaccine. This claim is misleading. #FakeNews #vaccine #COVID19 #coronavirus #BillGates

https://t.co/5su93id5OM
text.15:
The Centre told #SupremeCourt that #airpollution figures have become much better. AAG Aishwarya Bhati (for the Centre) said a comprehensive affidavit will be filed in 2days listing out the measures it has taken to tackle the problem of pollution. 

@boomlive_in
text.16:
A two-year-old image of a gathering by farmers during a long march from Nashik to Mumbai had resurfaced in the backdrop of the ongoing #FarmersProtests in Delhi. (26/n) #FakeNews #BOOMFactCheck
https://t.co/36NcgTmf8I
text.17:
An old image of vegetables strewn on a road is viral with a false claim linking it to the December 8 #BharatBandh called by the farmers of Punjab and Haryana protesting at the borders of Delhi.
#FarmersProtest #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews

https://t.co/jvcsBXYuYG
text.18:
The #IndianArmy has denied claims that its troops are being moved into #Delhi to tackle the ongoing #FarmersProtest after video clips showing convoys of trucks of the armed forces surfaced on social media with the same narrative. #FactCheck

https://t.co/x91mBh5yDS
text.19:
A nearly three-year old photo of #HrithikRoshan attending an event to commemorate the birth anniversary of Guru Gobind Singh was being shared falsely claiming that he has extended his support to the ongoing #FarmersProtests. (25/n) #FakeNews #BOOMFactCheck
https://t.co/NJxiTj0TOe
text.20:
A 2019 clip from USA showing #Sikh protesters chant pro #Khalistan slogans has been revived, falsely linking it to the ongoing #FarmersProtests.
#BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews

https://t.co/SL31Ynke06
text.21:
A photo of #NarendraModi standing in a hospital ward alongside Mukesh and Nita Ambani, is shared with false captions claiming that the PM had visited Ambani's newborn grandson at the hospital.
#BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #MukeshAmbani

https://t.co/stAbxOLECo
text.22:
Good morning, India. This is our top read today: Your take-home #salary could fall from April 1, 2021, if the government notifies the new compensation rules under the #WageCode, 2019. #ProvidentFund 

https://t.co/Jv4lLgczB4
